Text: Online Gift Certificates Arrive Quick As EmailAre you late buying gifts Send Sharper Image Online Gift Certificates by email Dear Jay To view this offer online copy and paste the link below into a browser emaildechtml Doing some LastSecond Shopping When you purchase a Sharper Image Online Gift Certificate it will be sent to the recipient as quick as email and youll go from late to great in a matter of minutes Online Gift Certificates can be purchased without any sales tax or shipping charges in denominations of and They arrive via email with your personal greeting and have no expiration date Sharper Images electronic Online Gift Certificates are redeemable at our Web site Copy and paste the link below into a browser for more information gojhtmltcidtlidtsourceurlusencatalogcategoryviewjhtmlcatidpcatid Best wishes for a happy holiday season Richard Thalheimer Founder The Sharper Image Special Offers Place an order of any size and enjoy our monthly specials off our Electronic Glass Scale gojhtmltcidtlidmssourceurlusencatalogproductviewjhtmlskuTN or our Winemakers Corkscrew gojhtmltcidtlidmssourceurlusencatalogproductviewjhtmlskuSM No discounts may be applied to your purchase of an Electronic Online Gift Certificate We hope you enjoy receiving Sharper Images email special offers and product previews However if you wish to unsubscribe from this email list please copy and paste the link below into a browser gojhtmltcidtlidussourceurlusenaccountemailregisterjhtml Please allow weeks for us to remove your email address You may receive further emails from us during that time for which we apologize Thank you

FREE Shipping to EuropeDear Richard Enjoy FREE SHIPPING to Europe when shopping Sharper Images new international Web sites To view this offer online copy and paste the link below into a browser emailocthtml Do you have family friends or associates who live in Europe Imagine sending them gifts of Sharper Image bestsellers like the Ionic Breeze Quadra or the CD Shower Companion without any shipping charges How is this possible Earlier this year we launched international Web sites that offer delivery throughout the European Union Our new distribution center in Holland ensures your order will arrive in just a few days Sharper Images international Web sites electrical products have been especially adapted for use overseas and instruction manuals are printed in English German French and Spanish This special offer applies to our Web sites for Germany in German and priced in DM gojhtmlsourcetcidtliddeurlsharperimagede United Kingdom priced in pounds gojhtmlsourcetcidtlidukurlsharperimageukindexhtml European Union in English and priced in Euros gojhtmlsourcetcidtlideuurlsharperimageeurope All prices include taxes and duties so recipients will incur no additional charges Choose your gifts early This FREE SHIPPING to Europe offer is good through the month of November only To redeem At checkout please enter CouponBonus Code N The items shown here and dozens of other great products are ready to ship right now with FREE SHIPPING to France Germany Italy Spain Sweden Holland Belgium Denmark Finland Austria Ireland the United Kingdom Luxembourg and Portugal Youre welcome to forward this email to all your friends here or overseas theyll also enjoy FREE SHIPPING to Europe for the entire month of November Enjoy your shopping And look for the international OFF monthly special Richard Thalheimer Founder The Sharper Image About this offer To redeem At checkout please enter CouponBonus Code N This FREE SHIPPING to Europe offer is valid through November Applies to online orders placed at any of three Europebased Sharper Image international Web sites Germany United Kingdom European Union for standard delivery to destinations within the European Union Included countries in all are listed in each sites FAQs on shipping and delivery charges Offer does not apply to any orders placed on Sharper Images main US Web site or on our other international Web sites such as Asia or Australia You fly Well buy Fly Virgin Atlantic Upper Class to London and get a Gift Card to the Sharper Image Copy and paste the link below for more information sharperimage We hope you enjoy receiving Sharper Images email special offers and product previews However if you wish to unsubscribe from this email list please copy and paste the link below into a browser for details gojhtmltcidtlidussourceurlusenaccountemailregisterjhtml Please allow weeks for us to remove your email address You may receive further emails from us during that time for which we apologize Thank you

Sharper Image Galleria online mall Why Because well pay you Sharper Image Dollars to shop there Imagine making purchases at your favorite online stores and getting back in Sharper Image Dollars Remember a Sharper Image Dollar is worth a REAL dollar when used to pay for purchases at Sharper Image stores catalog and Web site Heres how it works When shopping the Web go to sharperimagecom first then click on Galleria Youll see a list of more than participating online stores After you Register or Sign In just click on a merchant logo to go directly to that online store Shop as you normally
